For more information about these risk factors, go to ""What Causes Palpitations?""",NHLBI,Heart Palpitations
What are the symptoms of Heart Palpitations ?,"Symptoms of palpitations include feelings that your heart is:
                
Skipping a beat
                
Fluttering
                
Beating too hard or too fast
